import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { formatter } from '../utils/helper'; const View = () => { const {id}= useParams(); // params give id no. but we need index to fetch data const index = id - 1; const retrivedata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("transactionForm")); return ( <>

Transaction

{[retrivedata[index]].map((data, index) => ( <>
{data.transactionDate.value}
{data.monthYear.value}
{formatter.format(data.transactionAmount.value)}
{data.transactionType.value}
{data.fromAccount.value}
{data.toAccount.value}
{data.notes.value}
))}
View Transaction
); } export default View;
